dialogues.text: have almost reached the cannon...when the DREAD NINJA CLANLORD and his minions mount the parapet walk between t and it. The HISS of them drawing their EXOTIC WEAPONS and adoptin their FIERCE READY STANCE freezes the blood in the ronin’ veins. As the Ninja move forward, Okuda’s men try their best to engage them -- but are quickly beaten back, intimidated. That’s when Okuda’s men break and BACK AWAY. Chikara retreats with them...until he looks down and sees Kira’s legions pushing the ronin back in the courtyard. Closing in on his friends. On his father. And when Oishi looks up at him and they meet eyes, resolv floods back into Chikara veins.

dialogues.speaker: CHIKARA
dialogues.text: (stopping) No! We can’t! If we don’t open that gate, they die! But none step forward. Except Hazama.

dialogues.speaker: HAZAMA
dialogues.text: I’m with you, boy. Alone, the oldest and the youngest of the ronin share a look...then charge forward like tigers. As Hazama engages several ninja, CHIKARA draws his sword charges the Clanlord. As he nears, he gives a powerful kirioroshi downward cut -- but the Clanlord easily turns blade and delivers an arm crushing overhead chop.

dialogues.speaker: CLAAAAANGGG
dialogues.text: Chikara staggers under the force of the blow, and before can recover the Clanlord CHOPS again! And again.

dialogues.speaker: DOWN BELOW
dialogues.text: The sheer weight of numbers against them SQUEEZES Oishi’s force closer and closer together like a vice.  105. Bodies of the enemy pile up, but still they clamber over an endless tide. Hanjo turns to Oishi.

dialogues.speaker: HANJO
dialogues.text: We can’t hold.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: We must.

dialogues.speaker: ABOVE
dialogues.text: Chikara scrambles back beneath the Clanlord’s relentless assault. The Assassin Lord strikes FASTER AND FASTER, and a mighty koshi giri cut bounds off his blade with the for of a sledgehammer -- Chikara winces and reflexively SWITC HIS SWORD FROM HIS RIGHT HAND TO HIS LEFT.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: spies his son making the fatal mistake against all his training.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: No... THE NINJA CLANLORD’S mouth twists into a half-melted smile, recognizing the opening. And as he raises his blade for the final coup de grace -- That’s when Chikara STRIKES WITH A DAGGER THAT HAS BEEN HIDDEN IN HIS RIGHT HAND, pulling off one of the maneuver Minoru taught him! Like lightning, Chikara STABS the Clanlord in the leg, causing the assassin’s death blow to swing wide. And before the Ninja Clanlord can react, Chikara rises up...and with his DOMINANT LEFT HAND, swings his blade an SEVERS THE BASTARD’S HEAD FROM HIS SHOULDERS!

dialogues.speaker: BELOW
dialogues.text: Oishi watches with surprise and pride as his son KICKS th legendary Clanlord from the wall. There is a moment -- a perfect moment -- where Chikara an meet eyes.  106. Then with a warcry, Oishi throws himself back into the fi with renewed energy, driving Kira’s hordes back one last time!

dialogues.speaker: BACK ATOP THE WALL
dialogues.text: Seeing their leader tumble off the wall like a swath of night, the remaining ninja show fear for the first time a hesitate...and it is their undoing. Okuda and the others race back, and it is only a matter o moments before the ronin dispatch them in similar fashion Chikara and Hazama then lead the men to the CANNON and, u all their strength, TURN IT to face the INNER GATE. IGNIT the fuse and -- KA-BOOOM! The cannon ball SMASHES a man-sized hole throug the gate and SHREDS the few defenders on the other side i

dialogues.speaker: BLAST OF SPLINTERS
dialogues.text: Instantly, the Hazama and Okuda reload the cannon from a of ANTI-INFANTRY CHAIN SHOT stored nearby, reposition the cannon and -- BOOOOM! VFX: we FOLLOW the chain shot as it flies and CLEARS A BL PATH through Kira’s samurai from Oishi’s main force to th BLAST HOLE in the inner gate.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: recognizes his chance and --

dialogues.speaker: RONIN, TO ME
dialogues.text: -- CHARGES through the GORE PATH before the parted red se can crash back together. Oishi and his ronin race across the courtyard and duck through the blast hole in the gate -- then turn and plug gap with their swords. Kira’s legions try to carve their way through, but the ga the heavy door only allows them through one at a time. Th result is a samurai blender -- Kira’s men rushing through only to meet their bloody fates at the angry blades of th ronin. Stalemate. Kira’s overwhelming strength of their numbers has been temporarily neutralized.  107.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This is where we hold. There is no further retreat. (turns to look at castle) Hanjo. Minoru. Isogai. With me. And as they turn and stride for the castle --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mika sees the battle below. And more importantly --

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SHOT
dialogues.text: As they mount the keep steps, Minoru and Oishi hear her. Look up to spot her in the fourth story window. Minoru and she meet eyes, and there is a CONNECTION there greater than all other forces in the universe. Oishi recognizes it. Turns to him.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: Find her. Minoru nods, thankful, and races off into the castle. God help anyone in his way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A statue of a DEMON OCTOPUS dominates the room. Panicking servants scream and scatter as Oishi, Hanjo and Isogai. Oishi grabs a COOK as he races by.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: Where is your Lord? The man babbles, so Oishi knocks him down and puts his sw to his throat. The Cook points in the right direction. But as Oishi begins to move that way -- SIX WARRIORS race from the hall in full cephalopdian armo Hanjo and Isogai move as one to intercept the threat.

dialogues.speaker: HANJO
dialogues.text: Go.  108. And Oishi does.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ronin struggle to hold back immense waves of warriors The bodies of Kira’s samurai are piling high. Blood churn the ground to red mud. Kira’s soldiers work as a unit try to push through en mas but Basho uses his inhuman strength to hold them back. It’s questionable how long they can hold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Minoru bounds the stairs three at a time. Kira’s samurai from shadows -- and fall to the ground in a various assortment of bloody, quivering parts. Nothing is going to stop him.

dialogues.speaker: HERE
dialogues.text: And like a magnet drawn to true north, he exits the stair and reaches the room where Mika is held.

dialogues.speaker: MINORU
dialogues.text: Mika?

dialogues.speaker: MIKA, (OS)
dialogues.text: Minoru! He BASHES the lock, and when he pushes open the door Mika flies into his arms. She’s been strong and brave for so l -- a perfect samurai daughter -- but now that Minoru hold her, the dam breaks and she allows herself to be human, a woman, and sobs. Minoru just holds her. Never going to let go.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: moves through the castle on the hunt. Hysteria has set in and swarms of servants run in every direction -- but like magic, they all move out of Oishi’s way as he strides pas Then, ahead, through the crowd, Oishi spots a flash of pretentious silk.  109.

dialogues.speaker: KIRA
dialogues.text: KIRA wheels and sees Oishi...and the Lord of the castle t and run in utter panic. Oishi charges forward like a lion after prey. INT. MIKA’S CHAMBER - SAME TIME Minoru finally pulls away from Mika.

dialogues.speaker: MINORU
dialogues.text: We have to go. Taking her hand, he leads her down the hall toward the stairs...when someone strides out at the end of the hall, blocking their path. The LOVECRAFTIAN SAMURAI. Kira’s fiercest warrior. The demon that bested Minoru in the competition at Asano’s castle. The bastard that lead Mika’s father to her doom. His voice is the basso of funeral drums.

dialogues.speaker: LOVECRAFTIAN SAMURAI
dialogues.text: I bested you before, halfbreed. (beat) Kneel and I shall make it quick. Minoru gently pushes Mika back from what’s about to occur

dialogues.speaker: MINORU
dialogues.text: But this time I fight for more than honor. The two square off. This is a battle that had to happen. And this time it won’t cease at first blood. This time we will get to see how it truly ends.

dialogues.speaker: LOVECRAFTIAN SAMURAI
dialogues.text: So be it. And with slashing swords and steel tentacles, the Gods of explode into combat!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chikara watches as a massive division of Kira’s men split away from the group assaulting the gate -- and begin raci up the rampart steps.  110.

dialogues.speaker: CHIKARA
dialogues.text: They’re after the cannon!

dialogues.speaker: HAZAMA
dialogues.text: If they get it, they’ll breech the gate.

dialogues.speaker: CHIKARA
dialogues.text: (to Okuda and the others) Hold them back! And as Okuda’s force races to meet the octopus-armored samurai, Chikara and Hazama position the cannon at the rampart stairs and -- BOOOOM! Samurai bodies fly and fall as the stairs collapse. Then Chikara and Hazama charge into the fray.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oishi is following Kira’s terrified flutter of silk throu the labyrinth of hardwood corridors, gaining, when --

dialogues.speaker: AUGHH
dialogues.text: -- a yari SPEAR flashes out through a hole in the wall an IMPALES him through the shoulder. Then ——- SHUNKK! Another spear flashes out from a hole in opposite wall and LANCES him through the leg. With a yell, Oishi then SLASHES DOWN then UP, freeing him by severing the spears that pins him. Now, Oishi turns and looks about him... .-+-and sees 200 other SPEAR HOLES lining the walls. Kira led him into a trap -- a HALL OF DEATH. At the end of the hall, Kira watches smugly as Oishi real his predicament. But Oishi is samurai...and doesn’t fear death. Samurai training pulsing through him like a live wire, Oi continues to move toward Kira. Cautiously. Listening... And the second he hears wood sliding on wood -- Oishi turns performing a whirlwind cut known as Sparrows Flying and -- SHUNKK! SHUNKK-SHUNKK!! -- HACKS DOWN three more spears darting out at him!  111. As the speartips clatter to the floor, Oishi meets Kira’s eyes...and smiles. Kira’s face falls. And Oishi CHARGES. SHUNK-SHUNK-SHUNK- SHUNK! Waves of spears flash out, but Oishi’s sword whips around him at blinding speed, his amazing bladework turni the hallway into an EXPLOSION OF SPLINTERS as he races through to the end and after Kira. INT. CASTLE - OUTSIDE MIKA’S CHAMBERS - SAME TIME Mika watches in horror as Minoru and the Lovecraftian Sam hack and slash at each other in the mother of all battles Minoru’s sword versus the demon fighter’s blade and whipp tentacles. The fight is a blur, but like their previous fight in the arena, we again watch helpless as the TIDE SLOWLY TURNS against Minoru. The Lovecraftian Samurai repeatedly WHIPS OUT his heavy s dreadlocks to trap Minoru’s sword and strike down into hi shoulder. His back. His arm. But the worst happens when Minoru goes to defend a lightn fast attack -- that the Lovecraftian Samurai suddenly REVERSES, COMPLETELY SEVERING Minoru’s little and ring fingers from his right hand!

dialogues.speaker: GAAAAGHH
dialogues.text: The koto blade falls from Minoru’s grasp to clatter to th floor. And in that instant, the Lovecraftian warrior SLIN his head around and LASHES his tentacles around Minoru’s throat, YANKS the ronin close and --

dialogues.speaker: MIKA
dialogues.text: No! -- STABS Minoru COMPLETELY THROUGH HIS CHEST! Mika screams as she sees the bloody blade EXPLODE from Minoru’s back. The demon samurai yanks the blade out, then HURLS Minoru the ground like trash. Stomps on his chest and readies hi blade for the final, life-ending thrust. Minoru lays there gasping, all the fight bleeding out of onto the floor with his life’s blood.

dialogues.speaker: LOVECRAFTIAN SAMURAI
dialogues.text: Your father should have done this the moment you came out of the womb, halfbreed whelp.  112. And just as the Lovecraftian Samurai pulls back to strike We see Mika RISE behind him, Minoru’s sword held high! Wi righteous fire, she CHOPS DOWN! VFX - SLOW MOTION: But as the sword nears, the samurai SENSES the threat and wheels around, the blow missing him the width of a strand of silk. The sword clangs off the ground, and the demon samurai SMASHES MIKA DOWN with a vicious steel-gauntleted backhan Mika crumples to the ground, and seeing that -- MINORU’S -- switch is flipped. With a cry of rage, he rises from t dead, ignoring the pain to snatch up his sword and throw himself into one final all-consuming attack. The Lovecraftian Samurai tries to counter with his tentac -- but Minoru SEVERS THEM WITH A SINGLE MIGHTY BLOW! The samurai staggers back in shock, unbelieving, severed tentacles clinking to the floor around him. And that’s when Minoru finishes it. Sword whirling like a helicopter blade, Minoru VIVISECTS THE BASTARD INTO NEAT

dialogues.speaker: LITTLE SIX-INCH HORIZONTAL SLICES FROM HEAD TO FOOT
dialogues.text: Mika stares until Minoru turns her away from the gruesome sight.

dialogues.speaker: MINORU
dialogues.text: Let's go. And as he leads her away, HARD CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ronin still hold the portal...but they’re taking ghas injuries and --

dialogues.speaker: SFX
dialogues.text: Under the weight of the onslaught, the gate is beginning FRACTURE, while --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oishi ignores his injuries and TRACKS Kira to:  113. THE WOMEN’S APARTMENTS Leaving a trail of blood behind him, Oishi enters...and S Kira hiding among the women and children. Oishi strides to him like a wraith of vengeance. Grabs th coward by the collar of his robes and drags him across th room. Kira scrabbles at the floor as Oishi drags him away.

dialogues.speaker: LORD KIRA
dialogues.text: No! Please--! NOOOOOO!! Oishi dumps him in the center of the room.

dialogues.speaker: LORD KIRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I beg of you! I beg of you--! Oishi’s response is a lump of metal dropped at his feet. KNIFE Asano committed seppuku with. Oishi’s voice is a study in calm and control.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: You recognize it. It’s not a question.

dialogues.speaker: LORD KIRA
dialogues.text: .-w-what could I have done? He violated the law!

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: And you have violated the honor of your House. (slides the knife closer) Redeem it. Kira looks at the knife...and begins to cry. His tears ru his perfect powder-whitened face. His blackened teeth. Hi regal robes. It’s pathetic.

dialogues.speaker: LORD KIRA
dialogues.text: Have you no mercy? Oishi’s cold, hard stare says it all -- no. Eventually, with a trembling hand, Kira picks up the knif Sniffs and wipes his eyes with the sleeves of his robe.

dialogues.speaker: LORD KIRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You will tell them I died with honor?  114.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: I will tell them the truth. Kira nods. Readies himself. Exhales and -- SCRAMBLES backwards to grab a CHILD as shield, placing th dagger to the young girl’s throat. Kira shrieks at Oishi a shrill, panicky voice.

dialogues.speaker: LORD KIRA
dialogues.text: You get away from me or I will kill this girl! But Oishi isn’t buying into it. Like a machine, he steps forward and gives Kira a resounding open-handed SLAP acro the face. Then again. It’s not a beating for a man. As Kira sits stunned by the insult, the little girl runs away. Oishi then seizes Kira’s knife hand in an iron-hard grip.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: Coward... Know now the depth of my Lord’s bravery and honor. And with that, Oishi forces Kira’s hands to slit his own belly, committing SEPPUKU. Kira’s eyes widen in shock and pain ...and something else As Oishi forces the tyrant to cut himself open, Kira look down and NOTICES Lord Asano’s FAMILY CREST on the sleeves Oishi’s robes: two HAWK FEATHERS, crossed over one anothe

dialogues.speaker: LORD KIRA
dialogues.text: ...two feathers.... And with horrific realization, the twins’ prophesy comes clear in Kira’s mind. Kira tries to laugh, but grunts in agony instead. And dies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The legions of Kira’s samurai make a final massive surge the gate GIVES WAY! The ronin back away as the nightmare army FLOODS THROUGH. There is no hope now. The octopus-legions unleash a BLOOD-THIRSTY VICTORY CRY, as they CHARGE forward to utterly obliterate the ronin --  115. Mysteriously, Kira’s warriors SLOW. Then STOP. Staring in daze at the ronin only twenty feet from them. The ronin are confused by the sudden cease in battle, the realize the warriors are not staring at them, but behind at:

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: who steps out of the castle...KIRA’S HEAD held by its hai Oishi’s right hand. And, unknowingly fulfilling the prophesy, Oishi raises th head of the vanquished despot for all to see -- the “two feathers” of Asano’s crest on his sleeve “lifting Kira up live in the minds of his countrymen forever”. Utter stillness and silence descend on the castle. It’s a moment frozen in time, Oishi standing there... But this ultimate act of loyalty, of bravery, of bushido, resonates with Kira’s defense force...and one by one, the drop to their knees. And PROSTRATE themselves before the 47 ronin.

dialogues.speaker: DISSOLVE TO
dialogues.text: EXT. KIRA’S MOUNTAIN CASTLE - MINUTES LATER The stronghold’s monstrous front gates groan apart, and t 47 ronin walk out. Though none of them have died, most be mortal or nearly mortal wounds that they will soon succum to. But there is one final job to do first. So huddling together, helping each other, Oishi’s exhaust injured, ragtag band of fighters exit the fortress all of them were certain they would never escape alive. Behind them, the entire castle remains kowtowed in revere And as the music RISES, it sweeps us into a MONTAGE of:

dialogues.speaker: THEIR JOURNEY HOME
dialogues.text: -- The ronin descending the mountain. Oishi walks in the lead, Kira’s head dangling from his hand like a lantern o truth.  116. -- Reaching the foothills, they pass a farmer turning his field. The man stops dumbfounded when he sees the head. Bows. Then races away to tell the village the tale. -- Word travels quickly, and the inhabitants of Kira’s village are all waiting when the ronin crest the rise. Th peasants approach Oishi’s men as they pass. The men mutte words of thanks. The women openly weep. The children touc these new heroes in awe. Even the warrior monks in their blood-red robes bow in reverence as the ronin pass. -- And so it goes, all the way across the countryside. Moved by their tale, villagers line the roads in greater greater numbers to watch Oishi and his men pass. Giving t offerings of food. Water. Helping them walk. -- Chikara stumbles, and a hand reaches out to lift him u It is the FRUIT VENDOR and his DAUGHTER who scolded him i Edo. They help him up, then bow down in reverence. This gesture of respect gives Chikara the strength to continue -- When they reach Ako, they are surrounded by familiar faces. Shamed faces. The BURLY VENDOR who spit on Oishi beseeches him for forgiveness.

dialogues.speaker: BURLY VENDOR
dialogues.text: I’m sorry. I’m so sorry. I didn’t know... How could I know? Others appeal to Hazama, Basho, Isogai for having thought them honorless. Oishi’s wife, too, is in the crowd. She and Oishi and Chikara meet eyes. But the 47 ronin do not stop, and do not reach the end of their pilgrimage until they arrive at:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gravesite of Lord Asano... As they enter the sacred place, Mika goes to Hisae, who h her tight as her mother would. And as Mika begins to weep with weariness and relief, PAN AROUND to watch the ronin doing what they have literally moved mountains to do. Oishi reverently washes Kira’s in the cool water from the temple well. Then places the tyrant’s head and the dagger with which Asano and Kira both took their lives atop his master’s grave.  117.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: Rest now, my lord. You are avenged. As if in response, a wind soughs through the ancient tree bringing warmth. Peace. And -- SFX: THE SOUND OF HOOFBEATS. HORSES. LOTS OF THEM. Oishi and the ronin turn to the staggering sight of SHOGU TOKUGAWA TSUNAYOSHI atop an WARHORSE of mythical proporti He is backed by the Shogun’s ARMORED CAVALRY -- two hundr horses the size of tanks, encased in spiked and bladed st There will be no escape from this place. The Shogun’s pinch-faced ADJUTANT steps forward. SHOGUN’S ADJUTANT Oishi Kuranosuke!! Oishi rises calmly and regards the man. SHOGUN’S ADJUTANT You and your men stand accused of treason and the butchery of the Shogun’s envoy and Master of Protocol, Lord Kira Yoshinaka.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: It was not butchery, my Lord. SHOGUN’S ADJUTANT Is that not his head there!

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: No... What lays atop that grave is Justice. SHOGUN’S ADJUTANT He was your superior!

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: He was corrupt. (beat) My men and I followed the Code of bushido and honored our master by avenging Lord Kira’s treachery. The Code demanded it. Justice demanded it. We could do nothing else. A murmur rolls through the crowd. Agreement. The Adjutant senses the support of the crowd. Doesn’t like it.  118. SHOGUN’S ADJUTANT And in doing so, you defied a direct command from the Shogun forbidding you from exacting revenge!

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: (nods ) This is so. SHOGUN’S ADJUTANT The penalty is Death. (turns to his men) Cut these criminals down. But instantly the crowd PROTESTS, surging forward, placin themselves between the soldiers and Oishi’s men, shouting forestall the sentence. The Adjutant is taken aback by the reaction. The soldiers are taken aback. The Shogun watches impassively from atop his horse. With kindness and thanks, Oishi and his men gently extrac themselves from the safety of the villagers...and step forward to meet their fate. The Adjutant knows this is his chance. Turns to his men. SHOGUN’S ADJUTANT Kill them. But now even the soldiers hesitate, unwilling to mow down such courage and honor. Such utter exemplification of the bushido code. The Adjutant loses it. SHOGUN’S ADJUTANT

dialogues.speaker: SEE YOU ALL HANGED --
dialogues.text: And just as the situation is about to spin out of control

dialogues.speaker: SHOGUN
dialogues.text: Stop. The Shogun’s voice is the deep basso rumble of the Word o God, cutting through all existence. In the instant silenc the Adjutant goes prone. The soldiers and the crowd stand terrified. The Shogun steps off his horse like a deity of war descen to earth and strides toward Oishi.  119. As he nears, Oishi draws his sword -- and, instantly, fif ashigaru infantrymen spring forward drawing their own bla But all for naught. Oishi lays his weapon at the Shogun’s feet. Then humbly, Oishi bows before the warlord ruler of all Japan. The giant removes his iconic snarling dog great helm. And speaks.

dialogues.speaker: SHOGUN
dialogues.text: You've put me in an awkward position, Oishi Kuranosuke. Just as your Lord did.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: Never was that my intention.

dialogues.speaker: SHOGUN
dialogues.text: And yet the result is the same. (beat) You are criminals. You defied my order, for which I need to make a harsh example of you -- but you exemplified bushido in a time that has forgotten the meaning of the word. And the reason for it. (beat) That must be honored and never forgotten. Oishi considers the Shogun’s words. Then:

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: We acted, knowing the penalty was death. We are samurai and accepted that. And as samurai, we must meet our punishment. To excuse us of this duty would steal the honor from all we have done...and make us ronin in a way Lord Kira never could. (beat) This is our fate. We have accepted it. Strike us down.

dialogues.speaker: SHOGUN
dialogues.text: The country would never forgive me for shaming you so...and I could never forgive myself.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: Then let it be our choice. Allow us the honor of a samurai death, to die as our Lord and be buried at his side.  120. Heart heavy with regret, the Shogun acknowledges the wisd and the right -- of this.

dialogues.speaker: SHOGUN
dialogues.text: I will grant you an honorable death...under one condition: (as Oishi looks to him) That your bloodline continues, Oishi Kuranosuke. Your son shall live so that the heritage of such an honorable man will not be thinned from Japan’s future. Oishi is moved by the gesture. Meets the Shogun’s eyes, m to man.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hisae helps her husband into the pristine white robes in preparation for his seppuku. She’s fussing with tying the obi knot just so and getting increasingly frustrated -- when she simply drops her hand and begins to cry. Oishi holds her tenderly. Tilts her face up to look into wife’s tear-filled eyes. And he kisses her. Tragically. Passionately. Perfectly. When they part, Oishi turns to see Chikara standing at th door struggling to hold the stoicism of a samurai to make father proud, yet betrayed by the tears rising in his eye No words are needed here. Oishi moves to him and wraps hi into a fierce father’s hug. And as the tears begin to fall, Oishi holds him tight and whispers into his ear.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: I am so proud of you, Chikara. So proud of you... Then pulls back and looks into his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: I know you will carry on the family name with honor.

dialogues.speaker: CHIKARA
dialogues.text: I love you, father.  121.

dialogues.speaker: OISHI
dialogues.text: (hugs him again) We will meet again along the Path. Do you understand? Chikara nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ronin exit their preparation rooms and enter the hall The sight of so many white robes is disconcerting. Ghosts haunting a hall. As --

dialogues.speaker: MINORU
dialogues.text: -- steps out, Mika rushes to him, tears running down her face. In front of everyone, defying tradition and prejudice, sh hugs and kisses him. For in this moment, nothing else matters...save for the words she needs him to hear.

dialogues.speaker: MIKA
dialogues.text: You will live in my heart forever. From the corner of the room, a SOLDIER speaks.

dialogues.speaker: SOLDIER
dialogues.text: It is time. The men line up. Oishi steps from his room with one last look at his wife and son, takes his place at the head of line and begins to leading his men outside. One by one they pass through the temple portal, but as Mi reaches the threshold:

dialogues.speaker: SHOGUN
dialogues.text: You. The line stopped. Minoru steps out of line to stand befor the towering military giant. The moment is reminiscent of when the Shogun called him o at the combat challenge in Ako. The Shogun considers Minoru for a moment. He says nothing His stern face inscrutable. Then --

dialogues.speaker: SHOGUN
dialogues.text: I remember your father. He served by my side. He was a great warrior. (beat) (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: SHOGUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: As is his son. You honor the family name...samurai. And to Minoru’s utter astonishment, the Shogun BOWS to hi No longer a halfbreed in his eyes...but a samurai. Minoru is moved as nothing else on earth could possibly d

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oishi’s SAMURAI (no longer ronin) walk out to the temple steps and sit seiza. The scene is epic. 46 white-robed figures kneeling at the foot of the immense temple steps. A crowd gathered around them. Soldiers. The Shogun presiding over all. And as the music swells, capturing the poignancy of the moment -- the tragedy and the honor; the faces of the villagers and their loved ones watching on -- the samurai draw their daggers. They hold for a moment, daggers before them -- and that i how we will remember them, for, as they thrust, we PAN UP the branches of CHERRY BLOSSOM TREE sheltering the temple Where a wind blows, warm and peaceful, and as a drift of intensely beautiful SAKURA BLOSSOMS wipe frame... A TITLE CARD rises: As a result of the actions of the 47 Ronin, Kira's lands were dispossessed and the province of Ako returned to House Asano by order of the Shogunate. Oishi's son, Chikara lived a long life, bearing three sons and a daughter. At his death, at the age of 78, he was buried alongside his father and his comrades at Lord Asano's tomb as the 47th ronin. To this day, every December 14th - the anniversary of the attack on Lord Kira's stronghold - thousands of people across Japan, and the world, still gather at Sengakuji Temple to pay tribute to the 47 ronin and their example of bravery, loyalty and unfaltering honor. This film is dedicated to the memory of the 47 Ronin:  123.
